abstract: Microsoft’s pursuit of Yahoo may have run into some bumps, but its big software business is humming along smoothly.
snippet: Microsoft’s pursuit of Yahoo may have run into some bumps, but its big software business is humming along smoothly.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft’s pursuit of Yahoo may have run into some bumps, but its big software business is humming along smoothly.

headline.main: Microsoft Shows Gains, but Also Weaknesses
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Shows Gains, But Also Weaknesses

abstract: Microsoft continued to talk tough about its takeover feud with Yahoo, even as it reported fourth-quarter results that showed its online business, which trails far behind Google‘s, remains a problem area. Although the software giant’s overall results slightly surpassed Wall Street’s expectations, Microsoft’s shares fell 5 percent in after-hours trading.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft continued to talk tough about its takeover feud with Yahoo, even as it reported fourth-quarter results that showed its online business, which trails far behind Google‘s, remains a problem area. Although the software giant’s overall results slightly surpassed Wall Street’s expectations, Microsoft’s shares fell 5 percent in after-hours trading.

headline.main: Microsoft Talks Tough, But Earnings Show Weakness

abstract: Microsoft keeps insisting that Windows Vista is a winner, but the questions keep mounting — and Thursday’s quarterly report only added to the doubts.
snippet: Microsoft keeps insisting that Windows Vista is a winner, but the questions keep mounting — and Thursday’s quarterly report only added to the doubts.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft keeps insisting that Windows Vista is a winner, but the questions keep mounting — and Thursday’s quarterly report only added to the doubts.
